entry.title: About
entry.summary: Home Office Politics (HOP) has been a long time in the making. We registered this domain a long time ago as a way to poke fun at working from home; and juxtapose working from home with working in an office. Every so often we'll get…
entry.content: Home Office Politics (HOP) has been a long time in the making. We registered this domain a long time ago as a way to poke fun at working from home; and juxtapose working from home with working in an office. Every so often we'll get serious about the challenges of working from home too.
